abstract: The federal judge overseeing the Justice Department’s lawsuit seeking to block AT&T’s takeover of T-Mobile USA has set a Feb. 13 date for a six-week trial.
snippet: The federal judge overseeing the Justice Department’s lawsuit seeking to block AT&T’s takeover of T-Mobile USA has set a Feb. 13 date for a six-week trial.
lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing the Justice Department’s lawsuit seeking to block AT&T‘s takeover of T-Mobile USA has set a Feb. 13 date for a six-week trial.

headline.main: Judge Sets February Start for Trial on AT&T Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
